info.name: TT DeepDark [Colored Mail]
info.description:
Background, text and link color for Thunderbird-theme TT DeepDark.

[Fixed target area in thunderbird coming soon]
info.additionalInfo:
This is not a joke. Stylish is installable on Thunderbird.
I don't known since which version it is possible.
I tried it with version 12.0.1 and wrote this for my current theme.

data.title: Looks great except in Google Calendar Tab
